divs: sighting details1\27\12 7:15pm went out to put my oven grates in the grass i spooked a black ufo in the air 5ft in the air 20ft in my face ran around the corner of my house for better look and it was gone real fast,went back in the house to watch tv and it came back at 7:30pm this time my son saw it at the front door 3ft away and 3ft off the ground moving in a controled speed about 5mph all black square 3ft in size im on red alert now just so close this thing is checking me out ufo all the way to bad it did not stay for a bit i have a 1080p go pro camera
Summary: black 3ft square ufo going around my house close up front door and back
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Worcester
